name: Pitchfork Partners
description: We live in a new business reality. Business models have been reinvented. Supply chains have been restructured. The way we work has changed. Consumer mobility is impacted. Media consumption habits are changing.
Headline: Strategic Consulting
ShortDescription: Pitchfork Partners, set up in January 2015, is a new-age strategy consultancy, specializing in corporate and business issues that needs holistic solutions.

Highlights.name: RESEARCH AND INSIGHTS
Highlights.description: We use the latest technology to conduct research and mine data that can be translated into actionable insights. We work with clients to assist with strategy, planning and measurement. This empowers them to create results-driven marketing rooted in analytics and powered by strategy and creativity.

Highlights.name: INVESTOR RELATIONS
Highlights.description: We help brands communicate complex messages to key financial audiences. From helping to manage quarterly earnings cycles to developing a consistent messaging strategy, we deliver the whole suite of investor relations skills.

Highlights.name: PUBLIC AFFAIRS
Highlights.description: We help clients navigate the intersection of government, stakeholders and policymakers to boost ideas that will shape the future. Our experts will work with you to fulfill your needs and focus on creating positive impact.

enhanced_description: Pitchfork Partners, established in January 2015, is a new-age strategy consultancy specializing in corporate and business issues requiring holistic solutions. They work to enhance organizational reputation, provide comprehensive marketing and creative services, and offer expert guidance in investor relations and public affairs. Leveraging the latest technology for research and data insights, they empower clients to create results-driven strategies. A key business objective is to improve employee happiness and engagement, with capabilities extending to areas typically covered by Total Rewards, including advice on employee recognition and benefits administration.
